name: market for polyether polyols, short chain | polyether polyols, short chain | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/28051/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for short chain polyether polyols, in the European geography.;'short chain polyether polyol' represents an organic substance with a generic molecular formula of: HO--(AO)m ZO--(BO)n â€“H  whereas A, B and Z are organic rests. It is liquid under normal conditions of temperature and pressure with a molecular weight under 1000 g/mol. There are no publicly available information about the consumption of this substance on a consumer level. On industrial sites, the substance is used with MDI to produce rigid polyurethane foams.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'short chain polyether polyols' within the geography of Europe.

This activity ends with the supply of short chain polyether polyols', to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
